data.title: Yerevan Scout Group Visits Vazgen Sargsyan Military Academy
data.meta_description: On November 13, 2010, AGBU’s Yerevan Scout Group visited the Vazgen Sargsyan Military Academy. They toured the classrooms of the Academy, got acquainted with the conditions and were provided with detailed information about each specialized classroom. The brief presentation and lecture was followed by questions by a question and answer period.
data.text:
The AGBU scout leader giving a token of appreciation to their Armenian military guide during their November 13 visit.

On November 13, 2010, AGBU’s Yerevan Scout Group visited the Vazgen Sargsyan Military Academy. They toured the classrooms of the Academy, got acquainted with the conditions and were provided with detailed information about each specialized classroom. The brief presentation and lecture was followed by questions by a question and answer period.

AGBU scouts are instructed on the ins and outs of military maps.

The scouts were taught basic skills and knowledge on military defense and tactics, as well as locating and disarming landmines. Some scouts had the opportunity to do target practice. The group also visited the museum of the Academy. Following the in-depth tour, AGBU Yerevan Scouts gave souvenirs to the Academy as a token of gratitude and appreciation for the visit.

Scouts are treated to short lectures by Armenian military officers.
